message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your position, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $130? It's a fair price that reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $115? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I can afford it.
